findings.title: Donations can’t be sent to the contract
findings.description: The contract does not allow donations to be sent.

findings.title: A.2: Unlocked pragma (pragma solidity ^0.8.18)
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using, for example, an outdated compiler version that might introduce bugs that affect the contract system negatively.

findings.title: Use safeTransfer instead of transfer for ERC20 tokens
findings.description: Using transfer instead of safeTransfer for ERC20 tokens can lead to potential issues.
